FROM debian 
MAINTAINER Christian LÃ¼ck <christian@lueck.tv> 

RUN apt-get update && \
 DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get --no-install-recommends install -y git php5-cli php5-curl && \
rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
ADD https://download.sculpin.io/sculpin.phar /usr/local/bin/sculpin 
RUN chmod 555 /usr/local/bin/sculpin 

VOLUME /data 
WORKDIR /data 
EXPOSE 8000 
ENTRYPOINT ["sculpin"]
